meanings.sent1: After playing outside, the children were bedirtying their clothes with mud.
meanings.sent2: The spilled juice was bedirtying the white tablecloth.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous puppy was bedirtying the freshly mopped floor with its muddy paws.
meanings.sent4: Her careless actions were bedirtying her reputation in the community.
meanings.sent5: The graffiti artist was bedirtying the pristine wall with colorful paint.

meanings.sent1: The ink from the pen was bedirtying the paper.

meanings.sent3: The clumsy waiter was bedirtying the customer's shirt with spilled soup.
meanings.sent4: The gossip was bedirtying the relationships within the group.
meanings.sent5: The oil spill was bedirtying the once clear water of the lake.
